class.name: ru.fess38.finance.model.Account
class.sql-delete: update Account set isDeleted = TRUE where id = :id

hibernate-mapping.query: from Account where currencyId = :id and isService = TRUE and isDeleted = FALSE
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: UPDATE Account SET amount = ( SELECT a.amount FROM ( SELECT t.id, SUM(t.amount) amount FROM ( SELECT -amountFrom amount, accountFromId id FROM Transaction WHERE isDeleted = FALSE UNION ALL SELECT amountTo amount, accountToId id FROM Transaction WHERE isDeleted = FALSE UNION ALL SELECT 0 amount, accountFromId id FROM Transaction WHERE isDeleted = TRUE UNION ALL SELECT 0 amount, accountToId id FROM Transaction WHERE isDeleted = TRUE ) t GROUP BY t.id ) a WHERE a.id = Account.id ) WHERE isDeleted = FALSE AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT accountFromId id FROM Transaction UNION ALL SELECT accountToId id FROM Transaction ) a WHERE a.id = Account.id)
